description: This is an inferno grenade, designed to channel Netherum energy to increase its incendiary power.  Once you throw it, you will have five seconds to get away before it explodes into a raging firestorm.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on the grenade.

description: This is an active inferno grenade.  Better throw it!

The LV429 fires a series of extremely short high-energy laser pulses, more like bullets than a traditional laser beam, greatly reducing dwell time and increasing weapon effectiveness.  Matrix crystal technology has made the weapon compact enough to be man-portable and provided it with enough power for essentially unlimited combat operations, but heat dissipation is still a problem, preventing it from being fired more than once every few seconds.
//: Recharge time is 8 seconds due to bug #48019, making it actually 4 seconds. Reduce to 4 seconds if that ever gets fixed.
